Requirement_Description: Achieve 85% energy recovery rate across all systems
Maintain fluid loss below 1% across all fluid systems
Capture and utilize fuel cell waste heat for cabin heating
Implement closed-loop air recirculation with 90% efficiency
Recover and reuse hydraulic accumulator energy
Minimize H₂ boil-off through recovery and recompression
Optimize bleed air usage between pneumatic and ECS
Treat and reuse grey water at 88% recovery rate
Capture CO₂ from atmosphere achieving -5kg per flight
Implement regenerative braking for electrical systems
Share APU power with main electrical grid bidirectionally
Optimize battery charge/discharge cycles for longevity
Track all components through Digital Product Passport
Design components for second-life applications
Use 70% recyclable materials by aircraft weight
Implement predictive leak detection for hydraulic systems
Convert fuel cell water output to potable water at 95%
Recover heat from APU for cabin conditioning
Integrate all circular loops with CAOS monitoring
Optimize electrical load sharing across all sources
Implement filter lifecycle tracking and optimization
Design modular components for easy disassembly
Establish component refurbishment protocols
Monitor and report circularity KPIs in real-time
Minimize venting in H₂ fuel system operations
Implement thermal recovery from propulsion system
Optimize pneumatic pressure regulation for efficiency
Establish ground interface protocols for water reclaim
Track battery state of health continuously
Implement cryogenic cooling applications from H₂ system
